verses.verse: And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Hew <S%H6458><s%> thee two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%> like unto the first <S%H7223><s%>: and I will write <S%H3789><s%> upon the tables <S%H3871><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> that were on the first <S%H7223><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%>, which thou brakest <S%H7665><s%>.

And be ready <S%H3559><s%> by the morning <S%H1242><s%>, and come up <S%H5927><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%> unto mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai <S%H5514><s%>, and present <S%H5324><s%> thyself there to me on the top <S%H7218><s%> of the mount <S%H2022><s%>.

And no man <S%H376><s%> shall come up <S%H5927><s%> with thee <S%H408><s%>; neither let any man <S%H376><s%> be seen <S%H7200><s%> throughout all the mount <S%H2022><s%>; neither let the flocks <S%H6629><s%> nor herds <S%H1241><s%> feed <S%H7462><s%> before <S%H4136><s%> that mount <S%H2022><s%>.

And he hewed <S%H6458><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%> like unto the first <S%H7223><s%>; and Moses <S%H4872><s%> rose up early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>, and went up <S%H5927><s%> unto mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai <S%H5514><s%>, as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> him <S%H3947><s%>, and took in his hand <S%H3027><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%>.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> descended <S%H3381><s%> in the cloud <S%H6051><s%>, and stood <S%H3320><s%> with him there <S%H7121><s%>, and proclaimed the name <S%H8034><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> passed by <S%H5674><s%> before him <S%H6440><s%>, and proclaimed <S%H7121><s%>, Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, a God <S%H410><s%> merciful <S%H7349><s%> and gracious <S%H2587><s%>, slow to anger <S%H750><s%>, and abundant <S%H7227><s%> in lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> and truth <S%H571><s%>;

keeping <S%H5341><s%> lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> for thousands <S%H505><s%>, forgiving <S%H5375><s%> iniquity <S%H5771><s%> and transgression <S%H6588><s%> and sin <S%H2403><s%>; and that will by no means <S%H5352><s%> clear <S%H5352><s%> the guilty <S%H6485><s%>, visiting the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> upon the children <S%H1121><s%>, and upon the children <S%H1121><s%>'s children <S%H8029><s%>, upon the third and upon the fourth generation <S%H7256><s%>.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> made haste <S%H4116><s%>, and bowed his head <S%H6915><s%> toward the earth <S%H776><s%>, and worshipped <S%H7812><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%>, If now I have found <S%H4672><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in thy sight <S%H5869><s%>, O Lord <S%H136><s%>, let the Lord <S%H136><s%>, I pray thee <S%H3212><s%>, go in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of us <S%H7186><s%>; for it is a stiffnecked people <S%H5971><s%>; and pardon <S%H5545><s%> our iniquity <S%H5771><s%> and our sin <S%H2403><s%>, and take us for thine inheritance <S%H5157><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%>, Behold <S%H3772><s%>, I make a covenant <S%H1285><s%>: before all thy people <S%H5971><s%> I will do <S%H6213><s%> marvels <S%H6381><s%>, such as have not been wrought <S%H1254><s%> in all the earth <S%H776><s%>, nor in any nation <S%H1471><s%>; and all the people <S%H5971><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> which thou art shall see <S%H7200><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; for it is a terrible thing <S%H3372><s%> that I do with thee <S%H6213><s%>.

Observe <S%H8104><s%> thou that which I command <S%H6680><s%> thee this day <S%H3117><s%>: behold <S%H1644><s%>, I drive out before <S%H6440><s%> thee the Amorite <S%H567><s%>, and the Canaanite <S%H3669><s%>, and the Hittite <S%H2850><s%>, and the Perizzite <S%H6522><s%>, and the Hivite <S%H2340><s%>, and the Jebusite <S%H2983><s%>.

Take heed <S%H8104><s%> to thyself <S%H3772><s%>, lest thou make a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> whither thou goest <S%H935><s%>, lest it be for a snare <S%H4170><s%> in the midst of thee <S%H7130><s%>:
but ye shall break <S%H7665><s%> down their altars <S%H4196><s%>, and dash <S%H7665><s%> in pieces their pillars <S%H4676><s%>, and ye shall cut down <S%H3772><s%> their Asherim <S%H842><s%>

(for thou shalt worship <S%H7812><s%> no other <S%H312><s%> god <S%H410><s%>: for Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, whose name <S%H8034><s%> is Jealous <S%H7067><s%>, is a jealous <S%H7067><s%> God <S%H410><s%>);

lest thou make <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>, and they play the harlot <S%H2181><s%> after <S%H310><s%> their gods <S%H430><s%>, and sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> unto their gods <S%H430><s%>, and one call <S%H7121><s%> thee and thou eat <S%H398><s%> of his sacrifice <S%H2077><s%>;

and thou take <S%H3947><s%> of their daughters <S%H1323><s%> unto thy sons <S%H1121><s%>, and their daughters <S%H1323><s%> play the harlot <S%H2181><s%> after <S%H310><s%> their gods <S%H430><s%>, and make <S%H2181><s%> thy sons <S%H1121><s%> play the harlot <S%H2181><s%> after <S%H310><s%> their gods <S%H430><s%>.
Thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> thee no molten <S%H4541><s%> gods <S%H430><s%>.

The feast <S%H2282><s%> of unleavened bread <S%H4682><s%> shalt thou keep <S%H8104><s%>. Seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> thou shalt eat <S%H398><s%> unleavened bread <S%H4682><s%>, as I commanded <S%H6680><s%> thee <S%H4150><s%>, at the time appointed in the month <S%H2320><s%> Abib <S%H24><s%>; for in the month <S%H2320><s%> Abib <S%H24><s%> thou camest out <S%H3318><s%> from Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.
All that openeth <S%H6363><s%> the womb <S%H7358><s%> is mine <S%H4735><s%>; and all thy cattle that is male <S%H2142><s%>, the firstlings <S%H6363><s%> of cow <S%H7794><s%> and sheep <S%H7716><s%>.

And the firstling <S%H6363><s%> of an ass <S%H2543><s%> thou shalt redeem <S%H6299><s%> with a lamb <S%H7716><s%>: and if thou wilt not redeem <S%H6299><s%> it <S%H6202><s%>, then thou shalt break its neck. All the first-born <S%H1060><s%> of thy sons <S%H1121><s%> thou shalt redeem <S%H6299><s%>. And none shall appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me empty <S%H7387><s%>.

Six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> thou shalt work <S%H5647><s%>, but on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> thou shalt rest <S%H7673><s%>: in plowing time <S%H2758><s%> and in harvest <S%H7105><s%> thou shalt rest <S%H7673><s%>.

And thou shalt observe <S%H6213><s%> the feast <S%H2282><s%> of weeks <S%H7620><s%>, even of the first-fruits <S%H1061><s%> of wheat <S%H2406><s%> harvest <S%H7105><s%>, and the feast <S%H2282><s%> of ingathering <S%H614><s%> at the year <S%H8141><s%>'s end <S%H8622><s%>.

Three <S%H6471><s%> times in the year <S%H8141><s%> shall all thy males <S%H2138><s%> appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H113><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

For I will cast out <S%H3423><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee <S%H7337><s%>, and enlarge thy borders <S%H1366><s%>: neither shall any man <S%H376><s%> desire <S%H2530><s%> thy land <S%H776><s%>, when thou goest up <S%H5927><s%> to appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> three <S%H6471><s%> times in the year <S%H8141><s%>.

Thou shalt not offer <S%H7819><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of my sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> with leavened <S%H2557><s%> bread <S%H2077><s%>; neither shall the sacrifice of the feast <S%H2282><s%> of the passover <S%H6453><s%> be left <S%H3885><s%> unto the morning <S%H1242><s%>.

The first <S%H7225><s%> of the first-fruits <S%H1061><s%> of thy ground <S%H127><s%> thou shalt bring <S%H935><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>. Thou shalt not boil <S%H1310><s%> a kid <S%H1423><s%> in its mother <S%H517><s%>'s milk <S%H2461><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Write <S%H3789><s%> thou these words <S%H1697><s%>: for after the tenor <S%H6310><s%> of these words <S%H1697><s%> I have made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with thee and with Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And he was there with Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> nights <S%H3915><s%>; he did neither eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%>, nor drink <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%>. And he wrote <S%H3789><s%> upon the tables <S%H3871><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%>, the ten <S%H6235><s%> commandments <S%H1697><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H4872><s%>, when Moses came down <S%H3381><s%> from mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai <S%H5514><s%> with the two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%> in Moses <S%H4872><s%>' hand <S%H3027><s%>, when he came down <S%H3381><s%> from the mount <S%H2022><s%>, that Moses <S%H4872><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> not that the skin <S%H5785><s%> of his face <S%H6440><s%> shone <S%H7160><s%> by reason of his speaking with him <S%H1696><s%>.

And when Aaron <S%H175><s%> and all the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>, behold <S%H5785><s%>, the skin of his face <S%H6440><s%> shone <S%H7160><s%>; and they were afraid <S%H3372><s%> to come nigh him <S%H5066><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> unto them <S%H175><s%>; and Aaron and all the rulers <S%H5387><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> unto him <S%H4872><s%>: and Moses spake to them <S%H1696><s%>.

And afterward <S%H310><s%> all the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> came nigh <S%H5066><s%>: and he gave them in commandment <S%H6680><s%> all that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> had spoken <S%H1696><s%> with him in mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai <S%H5514><s%>.
And when Moses <S%H4872><s%> had done <S%H3615><s%> speaking <S%H1696><s%> with them <S%H5414><s%>, he put a veil <S%H4533><s%> on his face <S%H6440><s%>.

But when Moses <S%H4872><s%> went in <S%H935><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> to speak <S%H1696><s%> with him <S%H5493><s%>, he took the veil <S%H4533><s%> off <S%H5493><s%>, until he came out <S%H3318><s%>; and he came out <S%H3318><s%>, and spake <S%H1696><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> that which he was commanded <S%H6680><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%>, that the skin <S%H5785><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%>' face <S%H6440><s%> shone <S%H7160><s%>; and Moses <S%H4872><s%> put <S%H7725><s%> the veil <S%H4533><s%> upon his face <S%H6440><s%> again <S%H7725><s%>, until he went <S%H935><s%> in to speak with him <S%H1696><s%>.
